TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BuildItem extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Diagnostics.DebuggerDisplay("BuildItem (Name = { Name }, Include = { Include }, FinalItemSpec = { FinalItemSpec }, Condition = { Condition } )")

Docs.summary: Represents a single item in an MSBuild project.

remarks.format:
## Remarks An element in a project can represent multiple items through the use of wildcards. Therefore, each <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem> object does not necessarily represent an `Item` element in the project.
## Examples The following example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> object and uses the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.LoadXml%2A> method to add content to the project. The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection> classes are used to add, remove, and change items in the project.
[!code-csharp[msbuild_AddNewItem#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_AddNewItem/CS/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[msbuild_AddNewItem#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_AddNewItem/VB/Module1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value returned by <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.CustomMetadataCount%2A> does include pre-defined or reserved item-spec modifiers, because they are not custom attributes.

Docs.summary: Gets all user-defined or custom attribute names.
Docs.value: An containing string names for all of the user-defined or custom attributes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.CustomMetadataNames%2A> does not include the names of non-user-defined or non-custom attributes.

Docs.value: if the item was imported into the project; otherwise, .

Docs.summary: Gets the number of metadata set on the item
Docs.value: An integer representing the number of metadata items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value returned by <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.MetadataCount%2A> includes pre-defined or reserved item-spec modifiers as well as other metadata.

Docs.summary: Gets the names of metadata on the item, including pre-defined or reserved item-spec modifiers.
Docs.value: An containing name strings of all metadata on the item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value returned by <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.MetadataNames%2A> includes the names of all metadata, including user-defined and custom attributes.
